incidents.name: Video Insights Room Summaries for Rooms Unavailable on Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Twilio Video Insights room summaries for rooms were degraded for 39 hours and 40 minutes between 23:00 on 09/26/2023 and 14:40 on 09/26/2023 Pacific Time. During this period, a subset of video insights room summaries for rooms are not accessible through the Video Insights console dashboard. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Toll-Free Verification Returning 500s Errors

incidents.name: SMS Failures to India Airtel Numbers

incident_updates.body: SMS to India Airtel service was degraded for 3 days aprox. We estimate that the impacted initially started on 09/25/2023 and ended by 09/28/2023 at 2:00 AM Pacific Time. During this period of time, customers may have not been able to send SMS messages to a subset of Airtel India numbers. The issue has now been resolved.

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with receiving API rejections with error code 21614 for messaging API when trying to send SMS messages to Indian Airtel numbers. This incident has been resolved. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Service Disruption in Twilio API-s in the IE1 Region, in Ireland

incident_updates.body: We're making a correction to the existing post https://status.twilio.com/incidents/cjpncc0g8k15. Twilio Programable Chat and Conversations public APIs in IE1 region, in Ireland were degraded for 5 minutes between 9:56 and 10:00 Pacific Time on 09/28/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced 500s errors. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Service Disruption in all Twilio API-s (Conversations API, Programmable Chat, Voice) in the IE1 Region

incident_updates.body:
Twilio Programable Chat and Conversations public APIs in all Twilio API-s (Conversations API, Programmable Chat, Voice) were degraded for 5 minutes between 9:56 and 10:00 Pacific Time on 09/28/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced 500s errors. The issue has now been resolved.

*We're making a correction to this post, please check impact details at https://status.twilio.com/incidents/dglrb2zhzq1w

Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Conversations and Programmable Chat API. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Voice Suspension Banner in the Console in Active Accounts

incident_updates.body: This Console incident has been resolved and service is operating normally at this time.

The incident causing Voice Account Suspension banner in the Console is now resolved. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue in the Console and are actively working to deploy a fix. Customers may see the banner: ‘’Voice has been suspended. Your account has been suspended from making and receiving voice call due to potentially fraudulent activity’’.  Accounts remain active and operating. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available
